command.description: Paste content in a diagram (graphic+ semantic)
command.name: PasteWithModel

command.description: Call the alignment action
command.name: AlignmentCommand

command.description: Call the Show/Hide Compartments Action
command.name: Show/Hide Compartments Command

command.description: Call the Show/Hide Contents Action
command.name: Show/Hide Contents Command

listener.description: This listener listens for profile (un)applications to update the palette
listener.name: PaletteProfileApplicationListener

aspectToolProvider.description: This Provider handles actions taken after association creation. It modifies the 2 properties, member ends of the created association.
aspectToolProvider.name: Set Association ends properties

aspectToolProvider.description: This changes the way stereotypes are displayed in the created element. (Vertical or horizontal display, icon or text, etc.)
aspectToolProvider.name: Set applied stereotypes appearance

aspectToolProvider.description: This provider creates action that applies a list of stereotypes to the given element.
aspectToolProvider.name: Set list of applied stereotypes

aspectToolProvider.description: The actions provided by this extension modify a semantic element, giving static-defined values to some of his attributes
aspectToolProvider.name: Set meta-element properties

aspectToolProvider.description: This action modifies the list of stereotype that will be displayed for the specified element, and if they are displayed using qualified name or simple name
aspectToolProvider.name: Set list of displayed stereotypes

aspectToolProvider.description: This Provider handles actions taken after pseudostate creation. It modifies the name according to the PseudostateKind of the element.
aspectToolProvider.name: Rename pseudostate according to its kind
